slug: forget-remember-jimjamjimin-僕のヒーローアカデミア
summary: Forget / Remember - jimjamjimin - 僕のヒーローアカデミア | Boku no Hero Academia | My Hero Academia [Archive of Our Own]
body:
Forget / Remember - jimjamjimin - 僕のヒーローアカデミア | Boku no Hero Academia | My Hero Academia [Archive of Our Own]

I started a fanfic based on two OC kids who have non physical quirks, because I was inspired by the mind control quirk. This will get sad, but for now it’s wholesome. Sorry if anyone else had the same quirk ideas as me these just came to me whilst waiting for my mum to finish work lmao.

blog.name: ao3feed-bakudeku
blog.title: ao3feed-BakuDeku
blog.description:
Katsuki Bakugou / Izuku Midoriya fanfics on Ao3
Blog created April 2, 2019. No fics before this date will be archived.
This page is still under construction

title: A Good Old-Fashioned Tattoo AU
description:
by lalazee

“We were childhood friends. From babies. Then UA happened and, well –” A shadow crossed Deku’s face just as he turned away from Katsuki, and something clenched in his chest.
The notebook, burning in Katsuki’s fist.
“Then we went our separate ways,” Deku said lightly.

After their paths had split, Bakugou & Deku meet again as adults. While Bakugou begins to repent for the kid he used to be, he also starts to prove himself as he the man he is now.

Words: 14437, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

  • Fandoms: 僕のヒーローアカデミア | Boku no Hero Academia | My Hero Academia
  • Rating: Explicit
  • Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply
  • Categories: M/M
  • Relationships: Bakugou Katsuki/Midoriya Izuku
  • Additional Tags: Alternate Universe - Tattoo Parlor, Childhood Friends, Quirkless Midoriya Izuku, Pro Hero Bakugou Katsuki, Kirishima & Deku kiss exactly one (1) time toward the beginning

summary: Kacchan is the best salesman on the planet. Just imagine his angry dulcet tones trying to sell you whatever kind of stuff he has...
track_name: Kacchan gets a job doing commercials
caption:
Kacchan is the best salesman on the planet. Just imagine his angry dulcet tones trying to sell you whatever kind of stuff he has to offer. This is a good idea. This is a very good idea.

Bakugou: So I got a job doing radio
Midoriya: I never really had you down as the kind of person to do radio
Bakugou: I’m doing commercials
Todoroki: Who would wanna buy anything from you?
Midoriya: Yeah your tone of voice would put me off buying stuff
Bakugou: The fuck you mean!?
Midoriya: You’re scary, Kacchan
Bakugou: Fuck you
Midoriya: You’re not doing yourself any favours
Bakugou: Listen. They’re gonna do my commercial soon.
Todoroki: I can’t even believe you can follow a script
Bakugou: There wasn’t a script! Shut up and listen

blog.name: bnhagalposts
blog.title: Bnha Headcannons and Match-ups
blog.description: Hello, Guys, Gals, and Non-binary pals! Welcome to my humble Bnha Headcanons and Match-ups! REQUESTS ARE CURRENTLY OPEN BUT, I'M ONLY TAKING HEADCANONS RIGHT NOW!!! Thank you!

summary: Thank you very much I can't wait to read the headcanon
question: Thank you very much I can't wait to read the headcanon
answer:
-Uraraka is always happy to have Izuku help test her quirk’s powers. Sure sometimes she gets a bit sick after overusing her quirk but, Izuku is always there with a bottle of water and patting her back.

-Shinsou and Uraraka often study together since they constantly challenge each other, it allows them to work at the best of their abilities.

-Uraraka and Tooru actually make really sweet pop up cards to give out to homeless shelters.

-Imagine her surprise when Uraraka found out that Bakugou and her both volunteer for working and cooking at a food kitchen so they can help out others. Afterward, Bakugou and her get some ice cream. They probably end up seeing who can eat their ice cream the fastest and then they feel sick together.

-Iida and she often go running together in the morning. They just talk together about heroes and school work, Uraraka always feels a bit more at peace when she runs alongside her friend.

-Aoyama has been teaching Uraraka how to knit scarves. Since Uraraka doesn’t have a whole lot of money to get gifts for her parents, she started to work on knitting warm scarves for them so they can have some clothing for the winter weather.

-Also, she’s been knitting some warm clothing for Tsuyu since she doesn’t want her best friend to start hibernating when it gets cold!

-Tokoyami and her had a weird bonding experience over opera music. She was working out while listening to the Phantom Opera soundtrack and Tokoyami just nodded towards her in agreement. Sometimes they recommend different types of opera music to each other.

-Sato and her bake cookies all the time. Uraraka loves how it creates a sweet smell throughout the dorm and she loves just hanging out with her fellow classmate. They also end up getting more classmates to help decorate the sweets.

-One time Mina paid her 1000 yen (ten dollars) to send Mineta flying with her quirk. Sure she got detention alongside Mina but, it was worth it.

-Kirishima is the type of friend who will relax on the couch with her and watch cheesy romance movies. One time they were holding hands and holding tissues, bawling their eyes out when they finished watching ‘The Notebook’. They had to hug it out afterward because the movie made them so sad.

I hope you enjoyed and have a great day! 

Ophelia

blog.name: bnhagalposts
blog.title: Bnha Headcannons and Match-ups
blog.description: Hello, Guys, Gals, and Non-binary pals! Welcome to my humble Bnha Headcanons and Match-ups! REQUESTS ARE CURRENTLY OPEN BUT, I'M ONLY TAKING HEADCANONS RIGHT NOW!!! Thank you!

summary: Hello, could I get a bnha matchup, please? I'm a straight, short and chubby girl. I have a lot of body confidence issues but I...
question: Hello, could I get a bnha matchup, please? I'm a straight, short and chubby girl. I have a lot of body confidence issues but I try not to let it define me. I'm an INFP who loves tea, horror movies, the rain, drawing, and writing. Deep inside I'm a huge romantic who hides behind a hard demeanor. Those who push past it can see my sweet side, though. Even so, I have no problem calling people out if I have to. Thank you for all you do and for taking my matchup! I hope you have a good day! ❤
answer:
I would match you up with Shouji Mezou! Shouji is always in need of a good cuddler that can drink tea with him and watch the rain outside! I mean six arms you would get the best cuddling and hug experiences known to man-kind! When you two watch horror movies together, he’ll probably end up hugging you a bit tighter when a scary scene comes up and you’re always welcome to cuddle closer next to him. Shouji seems like the type who isn’t affectionate but, seriously this boy loves all the affection he can get, so you are free to give him all the kisses you want. He’s the type of boyfriend that is always smiling when you talk to him (though you can’t see him smile since he’s wearing a mask but, I promise he is smiling). You two might start out a tad awkward, you two don’t want to be disrespectful towards the other but, with enough time you would find it easy to open up to him. He loves when you show off your more sweet side (he loves all parts of you) but, when you act romantic around him, poor Shouji gets all blushy.



I hope you enjoyed and have a great day!

Ophelia
